instruction.value: DAY 1. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with prehydration.
DAY 8. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with prehydration.
DAY 15. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with 0.9% sodium chloride infusion.
DAY 22. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with 0.9% sodium chloride infusion.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with prehydration.
DAY 8 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with 0.9% sodium chloride infusion.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with 0.9% sodium chloride infusion.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 10 minutes concurrently with saline infusion.

additionalnotes.value: DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give chemotherapy as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute,hold chemotherapy and contact physician. If AST/ALT is less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin is ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1 AND Plts greater than or equal to 75 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 0.5 and less than 1 OR Plts are greater than or equal to 50 and less than 75 x 109/L: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 0.5 OR Plts less than 50 x 109/L, HOLD treatment. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give chemotherapy as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute, hold chemotherapy and contact physician. If AST/ALT is less than or equal to 1.5 ULN AND Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN AND bilirubin WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin is ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 15. If ANC greater than or equal to 1 AND Plts greater than or equal to 75 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 0.5 and less than 1 OR Plts are greater than or equal to 50 and less than 75 x 109/L: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 0.5 OR Plts less than 50 x 109/L, HOLD treatment. If AST/ALT is less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN AND bilirubin WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin is ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 22. If ANC greater than or equal to 1 AND Plts greater than or equal to 75 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 0.5 and less than 1 OR Plts are greater than or equal to 50 and less than 75 x 109/L: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 0.5 OR Plts less than 50 x 109/L, HOLD treatment. If AST/ALT is less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN AND bilirubin WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin is ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week or adjust dose as per prescriber. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give chemotherapy as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute, hold chemotherapy and contact physician. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1 AND Plts greater than or equal to 75 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 0.5 and less than 1 OR Plts are greater than 50 and less than 75 x 109/L: Give 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 0.5 OR Plts are less than 50 x 109/L: HOLD treatment. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than or equal to 1 and less than 1.5: Reduce dose to 75%. If ANC is less than 1 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay treatment 1 week. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than or equal to 1 and less than 1.5: Reduce dose to 75%. If ANC is less than 1 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay treatment 1 week. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute, hold chemotherapy and contact prescriber. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is greater than or equal to 1.5 up to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week or dose adjust as per prescriber. If AST/ALT is less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is greater than or equal to 1.5 up to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 1 and less than 1.5: Give 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 1 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: HOLD treatment. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute, hold chemotherapy and contact prescriber. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than or equal to 1 and less than 1.5: Give 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than 1 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay 1 week. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN AND Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN AND bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 8. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC is greater than 1 and less than 1.5: Give 75% of vinorelbine dose. If ANC is less than or equal to 1 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Hold treatment. If AST/ALT less than or equal to 1.5 x ULN and Alk Phos is less than 1.5 x ULN and bilirubin is WLN: Give as ordered. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin is greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.

DAY 1. If ANC greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L, Give as ordered. If ANC less than 1.5 OR Plts less than 100 x 109/L: Delay one week. If CrCl is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute, give chemotherapy as ordered. If CrCl less than 50 mL/minute,hold chemotherapy and contact physician. If AST/ALT greater than 1.5 to 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos 1.5 to 5 x ULN OR bilirubin ULN to 1.5 x ULN: Administer 75% of vinorelbine dose. If AST/ALT greater than 5 x ULN AND Alk Phos greater than 5 x ULN OR bilirubin greater than 1.5 x ULN: HOLD treatment. If vinorelbine held for hepatic toxicity, repeat liver function tests weekly. Once recovered, dose vinorelbine at 75%.
